data.name: Astral Cube
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Astral Cube. This is a 2.5D platformer experience where the rules are simple, move & avoid obstacles. Each stage have a start point and a finish point and with each stage you pass the next one becomes harder and harder. You will encounter traps with very complex behaviors where in order to avoid them you have to think smart.

Key Features

  • Goal: Avoid dangerous obstacles & survive.
  • Gameplay: Learn to be precise, control your acceleration and rotation.
  • Environment: You are alone in space, traveling through the unforgiving & silent environment.

data.short_description: A 2.5D Platformer unforgiving game, avoid obstacles & survive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD® FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 750 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD® FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 970 / ATI Radeon R9 series
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
